message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm really interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $900000. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, $900000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1200000. Let me know if that's more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1200000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
